solution_line_template: He issued {littering_off_leash_factor}L citations for littering and off-leash dogs, and {parking_fine_multiplier} * {littering_off_leash_factor}L = <<{parking_fine_multiplier}*{littering_off_leash_factor}={total_parking_fine_factor}>>{total_parking_fine_factor}L citations for parking fines.

Thus, he issued L = {total_citations_issued} / {total_citations_sum_coefficient} = <<{total_citations_issued}/{total_citations_sum_coefficient}={littering_citations}>>{littering_citations} citations for littering.
